---
title: "Models"
---

## Linear Models

### Simple regression

```r
model <- lm(score ~ age, data = data)
summary(model)
```

### Multiple regression

```r
model <- lm(score ~ age + condition + gender, data = data)
summary(model)
```

### Checking assumptions

```r
plot(model)
```

### Effect sizes

```r
library(effectsize)
eta_squared(model)
```
